All Classes

  • All Classes Class Summary Enum Summary 
    Class Description
    B2dSteeringEntity
    This class contains the logic to add steering behaviors to the enemy ships and monsters.
    BasicMenuScreen
    A base class to use ensure consistency across menus.
    BoatGame
    Main class which initialises the Game and implements changing between screens.
    BoatGame.screenType  
    Bullet
    Creates a Bullet object which contains relevant information such as speed, position and colour.
    College
    Creates a college object which holds relevant information such as position, health and collision data.
    EnemyShip
    A class which creates enemy ships which follow the player and try to kill them.
    GameState
    Creates game state used for initialising, saving and loading game.
    HealthBar
    Creates a HealthBar object which is rendered underneath
    Hud
    This class creates a HUD which displays to the user useful metrics, such as health and points.
    MapLoader
    This class allows the map texture to be rendered onto the game screen.
    ModeScreen
    This screen allows the user to choose what difficulty the game is.
    PauseScreen
    This class creates a pause screen which the user can interact with to return to the game or quit.
    Player
    Creates a Player object which holds relevant data such as position and health, as well as allowing the user to control the playable ship.
    PlayScreen
    Contains all the functions necessary to run the game and displays it on the screen.
    PlunderSystem
    A class which holds and performs arithmetic on the players plunder.
    PointSystem
    A class which holds and performs arithmetic on the players points.
    ResultScreen
    This class gives the screen which displays weather the user has won or lost at the end of the game.
    SaveScreen
    This class contains the screen to get which save game state the user wants to pick.
    SeaMonster
    This class creates sea monster objects which has the aim to hit into the player to damage them.
    ShopScreen
    This class provides the screen of the text to inform the user of what can be purchased with their plunder.
    SplashScreen
    This class contains the methods to create a splash screen at the start of the game.
    StartMenuScreen
    This class is what the user uses to learn the controls, and pick if they want to start a game or look at past saved games.
    WorldContactListener
    This class listens to any contacts between bodies during the game and performs the necessary actions when they collide.
